verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: too soon to start counting down to christmas it the first of november] and instead of watching the clock tick down towards turkey many are already counting the seconds until christmas but is it too soon sirius xm radio phyllis fischetto john ross santa kris kringle queens englewood new jersey winter village bryant park minnesota dr alexandra stratyner new york dr alexandra stratyner patrick ramsey
